name: Shimmering Nectar
desc:
Nectar that is full of pure elemental energy.
Scholars generally concur that Whopperflowers are advanced life forms among the elemental plants, but there has yet to be a satisfactory explanation regarding their predatory habits.

customize.name: Pyro Whopperflower
customize.desc:
A mimetic plant monster that attacks without warning and uses Pyro to hunt its prey.
The world of Teyvat plays host to plants infused with the elements. Having gained a measure of intellect, their "nutritional needs" have also greatly increased...

customize.name: Electro Whopperflower
customize.desc:
Energetic mimetic Plant monsters that use Electro to attack their prey.
When fully-charged with Electro energy, they can unleash a strong electric current from their crowns. As such, some researchers have tried to apply them in other areas...

customize.name: Cryo Whopperflower
customize.desc:
A mimetic plant monster that appears out of nowhere and uses Cryo in combat.
These plants lurk under the surface and ambush unsuspecting prey. With the passage of years, sufficient nutrition, and the right environment, it could even take root somewhere and grow into a giant Cryo Regisvine...

customize.name: Shimmering Nectar
customize.desc:
Nectar that is full of pure elemental energy.
Scholars generally concur that Whopperflowers are advanced life forms among the elemental plants, but there has yet to be a satisfactory explanation regarding their predatory habits.

customize.name: Masterless Stardust
customize.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

customize.name: Shimmering Nectar
customize.desc:
Nectar that is full of pure elemental energy.
Scholars generally concur that Whopperflowers are advanced life forms among the elemental plants, but there has yet to be a satisfactory explanation regarding their predatory habits.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Whopperflower Nectar
customize.desc:
Nectar extracted from the stamen of a Whopperflower that contains trace amounts of elemental energy.
The taste of the nectar has a hint of Sweet Flower in it.

customize.name: Furina
customize.desc: The absolute focus of the stage of judgment, until the final applause sounds.

customize.name: Shenhe
customize.desc: An adepti disciple with a most unusual air about her. Having spent much time cultivating in isolation in Liyue's mountains, she has become every bit as cool and distant as the adepti themselves.

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

customize.name: Hu Tao
customize.desc: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

customize.name: Keqing
customize.desc: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

customize.name: Sayu
customize.desc: A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.

customize.name: Sucrose
customize.desc: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

customize.name: Windblume Ode
customize.desc: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.

customize.name: Blackcliff Warbow
customize.desc: A bow made of blackcliff that features extremely sturdy bow limbs. It requires an archer with a strong bow arm to use.

customize.name: Favonius Warbow
customize.desc: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.

customize.name: Frostbearer
customize.desc: A fruit that possesses a strange, frosty will. A faint sense of agony emanates from it.

customize.name: Solar Pearl
customize.desc: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon and pulses with a warm strength.

customize.name: Lumidouce Elegy
customize.desc: A magnificent polearm adorned with azure crystal. It is said to have been a certain legendary Champion Duelist's treasure — and yet, not once was it ever used.

customize.name: Calamity Queller
customize.desc: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.

customize.name: Ballad of the Fjords
customize.desc: A polearm used by those seeking to catch fish in the tundra. It lets none escape.

customize.name: Deathmatch
customize.desc: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.

customize.name: Halberd
customize.desc: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot of damage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.

customize.name: Serpent Spine
customize.desc: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.

customize.name: The Bell
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

customize.name: Ferrous Shadow
customize.desc: A replica of the famed sword of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light. Feel the power of a legendary hero as you hold this sword in your hand! Imagine yourself as the great warrior himself! Note: Daydreaming not recommended in live combat.

customize.name: Iron Sting
customize.desc: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.

customize.name: Energy Nectar
customize.desc:
A thick and sticky honey that is full of energy.
The Whopperflower hunts by tricking its prey, a process it uses to possibly evolve into a more powerful and pure form.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Shimmering Nectar
customize.desc:
Nectar that is full of pure elemental energy.
Scholars generally concur that Whopperflowers are advanced life forms among the elemental plants, but there has yet to be a satisfactory explanation regarding their predatory habits.

customize.name: Whopperflower Nectar
customize.desc:
Nectar extracted from the stamen of a Whopperflower that contains trace amounts of elemental energy.
The taste of the nectar has a hint of Sweet Flower in it.

customize.name: Energy Nectar
customize.desc:
A thick and sticky honey that is full of energy.
The Whopperflower hunts by tricking its prey, a process it uses to possibly evolve into a more powerful and pure form.

value.text:
Crafted
Dropped by Lv. 40+ whopperflowers
Stardust Exchange
